1.0.name: wordpress/email-address-protector
1.0.description:
Add our new twitter widget to your sidebar to show your latest tweets with style and without JavaScript! Retweet, Favorite and Reply links are available.

This twitter widget offer you the possibility to show your last tweet(s) (THE last by default) in your WordPress web site. The advantage of this twitter plugin is the absence of JavaScript script to load tweets from twitter : a very good point for your page speed. Another advantage of this newest twitter widget is the possibility to use a cache system with an adjustable period. You also can show your avatar, action links (Favorite, Reply, Retweet), activate a slideshow of latest tweets, and customize the CSS – everything with this simple twitter plugin.

Features

In admin:

  • This Twitter Widget is easy to install.
  • Panel for easy configuration (Appearance -> Widgets).
  • Show or hide your avatar within our Twitter Widget.
  • Default CSS can be disable
